definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
to tap/to knock lightly/old variant of 撲|扑[pu1]
Kou Zhun (961-1023), Northern Song politician and poet
minister of criminal justice (official rank in imperial China)
minister of criminal justice (official rank in imperial China)
the winners become princes and marquises; the losers are vilified as bandits (idiom)/history is written by the victors

definition: see 成則為王，敗則為寇|成则为王，败则为寇[cheng2 ze2 wei2 wang2 , bai4 ze2 wei2 kou4]

sentences.english: Lady Kew could squeeze out a tear over a good novel too.
sentences.chinese: 寇女士对一本好的小说也能挤出泪采。

sentences.english: Carrasco and Padre set out to locate him and bring him back home.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉斯寇医生和神父出发去治疗唐吉柯德并带他回家。

sentences.english: After his death, he took Ms. Kou back to the nether world.
sentences.chinese: 他去世后，他带着寇女士回到了幽冥世界。

sentences.english: Are the loves of Turelure and of Sygne de Coufontaine an immature union or not?
sentences.chinese: 涂瑞柳跟寇房天的爱情，是否是一个成熟的结合？

sentences.english: Kou is our math teacher, he also presented a voice to us.
sentences.chinese: 寇老师是我们的班主任，他也给我们献了歌喉。

sentences.english: Then again, how does he know about the Granin papers to begin with?
sentences.chinese: 然而，寇德曼又是如何知道格兰宁的文件的呢？

definition: barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
surname Di/generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
old place name (in modern Linyi county 臨猗縣|临猗县, Shanxi)/two-character surname Linghu
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
